news.title: UN Commission says Israel is committing genocide in Gaza
news.summary: The report marks the first time such an allegation has been made publicly by a UN body.

news.title: BOLD LOVE announce Dublin show
news.summary: They will play Whelan’s on October 22

news.title: Bob Dylan tribute act Bringing Dylan Home announce Dublin show
news.summary: Bringing Dylan Home will perform at Whelan's on Saturday, October 10. Tickets are available now.

news.summary: Caroline Kelly presents 25 essential student albums to soundtrack your college experience.

news.title: Coachella line-up revealed, including Irish acts CMAT, NewDad and Kettama
news.summary: Tickets for the festival’s 2026 edition go on sale this Friday, September 19.

news.title: Cardinals announce debut album Masquerade and share title track
news.summary: Watch the music video for 'Masquerade' below

news.title: 40 years ago today: Kate Bush released Hounds of Love
news.summary: 40 years ago today, Kate Bush released her fifth studio album, Hounds Of Love. Partly recorded at Windmill Lane Studios in Dublin, the chart-topping record featured appearances from the likes of Donal Lunny, John Sheahan and Liam O'Flynn.
